challenges.name: Health Challenge
description: Navigate to a local area trail Challenge will list approved walking trails in the area
Walk 3.1 miles
In 40 minutes
Capture at least 5 Transamerica Towers to receive a bonus
Feel free to challenge your family and friends

challenges.name: Health Challenge
description: Jog around a local park
For 40 minutes
Capture at least 5 Transamerica Towers to receive a bonus
Feel free to challenge your family and friends

challenges.name: Wealth Challenge
description: Create your Grocery List
Add items manually or add them using your phone’s camera
Collaborate with your household members with the Shared List feature.
Check items off of your grocery list while collecting them through the store manually or with your phone’s camera.
Capture a total of 5 mystery icons to receive a bonus!
Challenge your family and friends!

challenges.name: Wealth Challenge
description: Create another Grocery List
Add items manually or add them using your phone’s camera
Collaborate with your household members with the Shared List feature.
Check items off of your grocery list while collecting them through the store manually or with your phone’s camera.
Capture a total of 5 mystery icons to receive a bonus!
Challenge your family and friends!

challenges.name: Reward 1
description: $10 Gift Card to Whole Foods

challenges.name: Reward 2
description: First 2 Months free at Lifetime Fitness

challenges.name: Reward 3
description: $15 Gift Card to Academy Sports and Outdoors
